name: Feel better, letterpress card, blind impression and ink
description:
Minimalistic and modern feel better / sympathy card.

Blind impression (no ink) and red ink were used to print this beautiful card. 

Letterpress printed by hand, on 100% cotton paper (no trees!), on a vintage press with an impression you can see and feel.

A2 folded card (4.25" x 5.5") and envelope. 
Blank inside for your personal message. Packaged in a clear sleeve.

Due to the process of letterpress printing there might be slight variations in color and registration.

/// Please note that the USPS new shipping rates have taken effect as of 01/27/13 with First Class International-bound packages being affected the most. I ship all my cards in sturdy rigid mailers with protection and they are thus considered "packages" and fall under this new increased pricing ///

name: Oh shit! pattern folded notecards, set of 6
description:
Oh, shit!
Perfect notecards to have on hand for all kind of special occasions, like
- forgot your your friends birthday
- forgot you made plans together
- your friends just found out they're expecting
- it's the crazy season and your friend is hosting the family

As you see, there are plenty opportunities to send this card.

Letterpress printed by hand, on 100% cotton paper (no trees!), on a vintage press with an impression you can see and feel. The pattern is blind impressed (no ink used) and the words are printed in grey.

Set of 6 4bar folded cards (3.5" x 4.875") and matching envelopes. 
Packaged in a kraft box.

Due to the process of letterpress printing there might be slight variations in color and registration.

name: The only difference between a good day and a bad day, limited edition print
description:
....is your attitude.
Wait, it's that easy really? Well maybe not but a good reminder nevertheless!
This 5x7 print looks great framed or just adhered to your wall with washi tape.
Letterpress printed by hand, on 100% cotton paper (no trees!), on a vintage press with an impression you can see and feel.

5x 7 limited edition print, signed and numbered on the back. They are shipped in a stay flat protective envelope.

// sent me an email if you want this print matted for an additional cost //

Due to the process of letterpress printing there might be slight variations in color and registration.

name: Manly notecards [ Oh hi }, letterpress set of 4
description:
Having had just one too many complaints from my male designer friends about the lack of manly little notecards, I designed and printed these as a gift for one of them...and then I had to print more, lots more. 
These sets of 4 are a really nice little gift for your male friends or yourself to write a quick note on super heavy and stylish card stock. 
Letterpress printed by hand, on 100% cotton paper (no trees!), on a vintage press with an impression you can see and feel.
